"A.D.2028/4/10/13:30": "Fufu, very nice! How long has it been since I've met an opponent like this?"
"W-wait a minute! They're fighting on par with <%me>?! What's going on with this person?!"
"In fact... according to these readings, she's not even using Ether! That's just flesh and blood! Is that really an Earthling?!"
"Even so, I personally don't want to consider that monster a fellow Earthling..."
"Yeah... me... either..."
"My, my, my, such cruel words. I am but an ordinary human being."
"You all seem to misunderstand, humans can do much more than this."
"The most terrifying thing of all is something that can't be understood, to those who try to hide whatever is 'inconvenient' to them."
"Both Earth Guide and Mother, setting up barriers to keep away the civilians, while laying your groundwork and engaging in skirmishes behind the scenes..."
"It's very pathetic."
"You should all take more pride in your power."
"Show them all what humans can really do. If not us, then who will?"
"Fufu, such a good reaction speed."
"What!? With your bare hands!?"
"One and two and-"
"Uwaaaaaaaaa!!"
"Your reaction time is good. You seem to have some sense as well. However, your will is... lacking. Your blade isn't trying to kill me."
"Then, let's do this - I will let you cut me once, in any way you wish. That should determine your resolve, right?"
"What...? D-Don't underestimate me!"
"I'm... really going to cut you!"
"Yes, go ahead. There's no need to hold back. If you hit me in the right spot, you might just kill me right here."
"Kill...? I'm going to... kill... someone?"
"Hah... hah... hah..."
"Get down, Hitsugi!"
"Oh my, how overprotective of you. Such a shame, I gave you a chance to increase the strength on your side."
"My interest has faded today... It's not like this was a request from Mother, so I'll be ending our meeting for today."
"However, today's fight was very fun. Especially you, <%me>. You were truly a wonderful opponent."
"With you, I feel like I can enjoy a fun fight anytime. Let's fight one-on-one soon, okay?"
"Well then, everyone, until we meet again. Please try not to die until I kill you, okay?"
"She ran...? No... She let us go?"
"The enemy has disappeared beyond the search range in an instant. What kind of teleportation power does she have?"
"That's the same thing I'm wondering..."
"However, since we were just ambushed, does that mean the meeting has been exposed?"
"I don't know about that... Even Mother Cluster doesn't seem to be able to control that demon."
"In any case, we should move quickly. Let's go, this way."
"However, your will is... lacking. Your blade isn't trying to kill me."
"TEST"
